data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Kastamonu do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kastamonu, Turkey

data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the state of Kastamonu, Turkey. Please, stir the 138 believers here to pray for awakening.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 2667 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, help the 138 believers in Kastamonu to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 367,962 lost friends and neighbors.
Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the state of Kastamonu, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Bosniak people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Kastamonu to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Kastamonu, Turkey that you have set your Son over all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked.
data.verse: he raised Christ from the dead and seated him at his right hand in the heavenly realms, far above all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked, not only in the present age but also in the one to come.

data.section_summary:
the state of Kastamonu, Turkey has a population of 368,100.

We estimate Kastamonu has 138 people who might know Jesus, 2,061 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 365,901 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 2,667 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Kastamonu, Turkey to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.
